SELECT
from sys_menu t where t.deleted = false order by t.pid ,t.sort

SELECT
from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where o.operator_id = #{operatorId} and t.deleted = false and t.grade <> 3

SELECT
from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where o.operator_id = #{operatorId} and t.deleted = false and t.grade = 3

SELECT
from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where o.operator_id = #{operatorId} and t.deleted = false

select
from sys_menu where nid = #{nid} and pid = #{pid} and deleted = false limit 1
